VulnerabilityDesc.Description: Anyone can withdraw interest for any lender.
VulnerabilityDesc.Repair: Add access control by requiring the caller to be the lender

VulnerabilityDesc.Description: Interest accrued could be zero for small decimal tokens.
VulnerabilityDesc.Repair: Scale the principal amount to precision (1e18) amounts or use tokens with higher decimals

VulnerabilityDesc.Description: Anyone can deposit the entire lenderPool to a known strategy at a pre-fixed time, potentially at a less favorable rate.
VulnerabilityDesc.Repair: Add access control on start, e.g. only borrower can call through pooledCreditLine

VulnerabilityDesc.Description: Pool Credit Line May Not Able to Start When _borrowAsset is Non ERC20 Compliant Tokens
LenderPool : Principal withdrawable is incorrectly calculated if start() is invoked with non-zero start fee
VulnerabilityDesc.Repair: Save the initial supply in minBorrowAmount and replace totalSupply[_id] with it. In terminate(), the shares withdrawable can simply be _sharesHeld.

VulnerabilityDesc.Description: PooledCreditLine : termination likely fails because  _principleWithdrawable  is treated as shares
VulnerabilityDesc.Repair: The amount of shares to withdraw can simply be _sharesHeld.
